name: Sevenmiles Table
description: Sevenmiles, designed by Roberto Lazzeroni for Ceccotti Collezioni, showcases his superb ability to interpret modern style in works that respond to architectural inspirations. This elegant table, stretching up to 350 cm in length and made from solid North American walnut or ash wood with options for glass or wooden tabletops, reflects the structure of bridges in both architecture and organic design. The name 'Sevenmiles' refers to a famous seven-mile-long bridge in Florida, USA.
